title: Vision and Image processing in Hostile Environment Navigation Robot
desc: Hostile Environment Navigation Robot is intended to be used on emergency and endangering locations for quick visualization, situation awareness and decision making. Designing and developing the vision module was my primary responsibility in group project pursued at the University of Ottawa. Implemented features such as Obstacle detection and Maneuvering, Object Detection using customized pre-trained ML/DL models, Camera Calibration and distance calculation etc.

title: Deep Learning based MRI segementation to detect tumors
desc: Incorporated Image Processing and Deep Learning to create a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) modal that detects the presence of a tumor in an MRI Image. Trained and fine tuned the model based on performance evaluation on the test images.
technologies: PC (Compute), OpenCV, Keras and TensorFlow (Frameworks) and Python (Programming Language)

title: Banking Customer Churn Rate Prediction
desc: Evaluated performance of various ML models in predicting churn rate for Banking Customer data
technologies: PC and Jupyter Notebook (Compute), Pandas, NumPy, Keras and TensorFlow (Frameworks) and Python (Programming Language)

title: Wideband Speech Codec Implementation
desc: Using Algebraic Code Excited Linear Prediction model to Compress audio files without loss.
technologies: MATLAB and Windows OS with sample Speech dataset

title: Interview and Employee Onboarding System
desc: Full stack web application developed in .NET Framework and React for Employee onboarding
technologies: React, Redux, Saga, Bootstrap and Axios(Frontend); Microsoft .Net Web-API and SQL Server (Backend)

title: Sports Live Score Web App
desc: Responsive Front End application developed with React and Material UI to get live score alerts from football score APIs
technologies: React, Material UI, NodeJS and ExpressJS (MERN stack)

title: Personal Food Log Mobile App with Reminders
desc: A Mobile App that tracks calorie intake and allows users to log food consumed
technologies: React-Native, Redux, Axios (Frontend); NodeJS and ExpressJS (Backend); AWS S3 and Amplify (Cloud)

title: Task Organizer App
desc: A responsive full stack web application allowing authenticated and authorized users to create and manage tasks along with reminders
